entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inuvik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -41.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inuvik Airport 03:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -41.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -45.1°C
Wind: W 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
